articles.author: Helen Branswell
articles.title: U.S. death from Lassa fever, an Ebola-like virus, is reported in Iowa - STAT
articles.description: A person from Iowa who recently returned to the United States from West Africa has died after contracting Lassa fever, a virus that can cause Ebola-like illness in some patients.
articles.content: A person from Iowa who recently returned to the United States from West Africa has died after contracting Lassa fever, a virus that can cause Ebola-like illness in some patients. State health officia… [+4404 chars]
